Reconnect with nature at this uforgettable escape it a unique and serene experience wit its breathtaking view of the pine forest and direct access to the river. Ther property is surrounded bu lush greenary and the sound of the river creates a peaceful ambiance. Guests can enjoy a moring cup of cofee or a relaxing evening by the river, taking in the beautiful scenary. Guests can also indulge in outdoor activities suc as hiking and fishin in the nearby forest and river.
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { AreaService } from '../area.service'; import { Area } from 'area'; @Component({ selector: 'app-rooms', templateUrl: './rooms.component.html', styleUrls: ['./rooms.component.css'], }) export class RoomsComponent { area: Area | undefined; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private areaService: AreaService ) // private location: Location {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getArea(); } getArea(): void { const id = Number(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')); this.areaService.getArea(id).subscribe((area) => (this.area = area)); console.log(this.area); } }
